p: Regarding the CIM carvacrol, the same value (0.5 mg mL −1) was observed when both strains ( S. aureus ATCC 6538 and OVRSA) were tested (Table 4). Carvacrol and thymol present the ability to dissolve themselves in the cytoplasmic membrane, aligning the fatty acid chains and providing an increase in the passive permeability of the membrane.
